modName: Blow up -a little sexy apparel replacer addon-
summary:
* First of all, I cannot speak English. This is a machine translation. *

This MOD is add-on of \"a little sexy apparel replacer(LSAR)\", and adds \"Blow up\" shout to the player (automatically).
You can blow up the skirt of the LSAR\'s apparels by shouting \"Blow up\".

  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Twz3L5QhIY
descriptionHtml:
Blow up -a little sexy apparel replacer addon-

Author:
  Cotyounoyume

Version:
  2.30

Description:
  * First of all, I cannot speak English. This is a machine translation. *

  This MOD is add-on of \"a little sexy apparel replacer(LSAR)\", and adds \"Blow up\" shout to the player (automatically).
  You can blow up the skirt of the LSAR\'s apparels by shouting \"Blow up\". 

  Video:
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Twz3L5QhIY
  [youtube]5Twz3L5QhIY[/youtube]

Requirement:
  !!! This MOD requires Skyrim 1.7.7 and SKSE 1.5.11 or higher !!!

  1. Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
	http://skse.silverlock.org/
  2. a little sexy apparel replacer - for CBBE/UNP/ADEC -
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5564/
  3. Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS (ver.3.1.1 or higher)
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811
	*** you need \"FNIS Behavior Files X_X_X -- ALWAYS necessary\"

  (Optional)
  4. EDialog(ver.1.3 or higher)
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19169

Install:
  In the beginning, please install all \"Requirement\" mod, if you have not installed those yet.
  Then, install by using NMM, or put this mod\'s \"Data\" folder to Skyrim\'s \"Data\" folder.
  Finally, run a generator tool GenerateFNISforUsers.exe.
  (You will find GenerateFNISforUsers.exe. in,
	\\your_skyrim_folder\\Data\\tools\\GenerateFNIS_for_Users)

  Note: FNIS is a little complex MOD. Please read Description of FNIS well if you install FNIS for the first time. 
	-------Quote---------
	You will have to run a generator tool GenerateFNISforUsers.exe (part of FNIS Behaviors) 
	every time you have installed or de-installed FNIS, or an FNIS based mod.
	-------Quote---------
	http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811#
author: Cotyounoyume
